about_the_game:
Anima Shin Gun is a Bullet Hell Rail Shooter where you get shot to survive.

Engage enemies and absorb their bullets as “seconds of life” by switching to the right color frequency. Thus, surviving long enough to break the time loop you’re trapped in and complete the ENTIRE adventure before the countdown gets to zero.

GET SECONDS OF PLAY TIME BY GETTING SHOT

A big countdown on top and a grand amount of bullets on screen that YOU DON'T AVOID but, when hit while being with the same color, give you seconds of play time for your current playthrough. if you don't get enough seconds, or just didn't spend them wisely, it is game over back to the beginning.

PLAY AS AMELIA, AN ANIMAL HERO WHO STARTS QUESTIONING HUMANITY

After believing to be a hero for a long time, and discovering she's been living on an endless time loop, Amelia, as an anthropomorphic animal android, starts questioning the real value of humanity. With the help of her corky team, see how this branching story unfolds in a comic, introspective and humanly way through the eyes of animals that once worshipped humanity.

EXPLORE WORLDS AND FIGHT THEIR RULERS

The secret of the time loop lies between the worlds that conform it. Visit each of them with their distinguishable environment, culturally recognizable music, and clearly defined Rail Shooter and Third Person Shooter sections to defeat every single one of the corky baddies that look after them.

UNLOCK PATHS, WEAPONS, VEHICLES AND ABILITIES

Along your journey you'll find a variety of weapons and vehicles that, not only will help get through your levels, but also grant you certain abilities (or punishments) and knowledge to help you destroy your enemies and uncover the secrets behind the loop.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10 version 1909 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 @ 2.80GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 (6GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10 version 1909 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K @ 3.60GHz or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 (6GB) or AMD Radeon RX 5700 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
